text:
View this post on Instagram
A tip for Indian men : A black woolly turtleneck can make most of you seem exponentially smarter, especially if you don’t ask the woman sitting on the other side of your precious jar of granola what ‘exponentially’ means. Also it doesn’t help if you call the other person ‘Maha Pakau’ when they try to give you the correct definition. #TravelDiaries
A post shared by Twinkle Khanna (@twinklerkhanna) on Feb 13, 2019 at 2:41am PST
title: Akshay Kumar:Akshay Kumar Trolls Wife Twinkle Khanna Yet Again, Shares Her Dancing Video On Valentine’s Day
description: On Valentine’s Day today, while everyone is posting love-filled messages for each other, Akshay Kumar posted an adorable video of Twinkle Khanna dancing and singing Apna Time Ayega. But what caught our attention was the caption of the video, which had a hashtag “PakaoingSince2001”.
